content: Should we rename docs#MeasureTheory.Memℒp to MeasureTheory.MemLp? If I understand correctly, in mathlib 3 we needed to distinguish between docs3#measure_theory.mem_ℒp and "mem_Lp" as in ∈ Lp _ _ _ but this is no longer needed in mathlib4 because memLp differs from mem_Lp.
It seems that the linkifier fails on Unicode.
Also it's very inconvenient to search in the docs.
I would really prefer to avoid the only distinguishing feature being _, but having said that, I'll go away and let everyone else decide.

There is a serious mathematical distinction between ℒp (a set of functions) and Lp (a set of equivalence classes of functions), to it would feel really disturbing to me to have memLp speaking about ℒp. I'd rather keep memℒp.
Yury G. Kudryashov has marked this topic as resolved.
